org.apache.twill.api

Class Configs.Keys

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.twill.api.Configs.Keys
  • Enclosing class:
    Configs

    public static final class Configs.Keys
extends Object
    Defines keys being used in configuration.

      Setting for enabling log collection.
      static String SECURE_STORE_UPDATE_LOCATION_ENABLED
      Set this to false to disable the secure store updates done by default.

      Size in MB for the memory size of the YARN application master container.

      Size in MB for the reserved non-heap memory size for the YARN application Java process.

      Interval time in milliseconds for the attempt failures validity interval in YARN.
      static String YARN_MAX_APP_ATTEMPTS
      Maximum number of attempts to run the application by YARN if there is failure.

      • LOCATION_CACHE_EXPIRY_MS

        public static final String LOCATION_CACHE_EXPIRY_MS
        Setting the expiration time in milliseconds of unused files in the location cache. The value should be as long as the period when the same application will get launched again.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOCATION_CACHE_ANTIQUE_EXPIRY_MS

        public static final String LOCATION_CACHE_ANTIQUE_EXPIRY_MS
        Setting the expiration time in milliseconds of unused files created by older runs in the location cache. The value should be relatively short as those cache files won't get reused after those applications that are using files completed. This expiry is mainly to workaround the delay that twill detects the set of all running applications from ZK.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • YARN_AM_MEMORY_MB

        public static final String YARN_AM_MEMORY_MB
        Size in MB for the memory size of the YARN application master container.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • YARN_AM_RESERVED_MEMORY_MB

        public static final String YARN_AM_RESERVED_MEMORY_MB
        Size in MB for the reserved non-heap memory size for the YARN application Java process. The actual reserved memory size is limited by the HEAP_RESERVED_MIN_RATIO.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • YARN_MAX_APP_ATTEMPTS

        public static final String YARN_MAX_APP_ATTEMPTS
        Maximum number of attempts to run the application by YARN if there is failure.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • YARN_ATTEMPT_FAILURES_VALIDITY_INTERVAL

        public static final String YARN_ATTEMPT_FAILURES_VALIDITY_INTERVAL
        Interval time in milliseconds for the attempt failures validity interval in YARN. YARN only limit to the maximum attempt count for failures in the given interval.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOG_COLLECTION_ENABLED

        public static final String LOG_COLLECTION_ENABLED
        Setting for enabling log collection.
        See Also:
